verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا وَقَعَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13200'>ٱ</tajweed>لْوَاقِعَةُ
verses.translation: Когда неотвратимое событие наступит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَيْسَ لِوَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13201'>قْ</tajweed>عَتِهَا كَاذِبَةٌ
verses.translation: Нет ни одной (души), Которая в приход его не верит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: خَافِضَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13202'>ةٌ ر</tajweed>َّافِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Одних повергнув (в униженье), Других почетом увенчав

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِذَا رُجَّتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13203'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَرْضُ رَجًّا
verses.translation: Когда (смертельной) дрожью сотрясется вся земля

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَبُسَّتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13204'>ٱ</tajweed>لْجِبَالُ بَسًّا
verses.translation: И горы раскрошатся в пыль

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَكَانَتْ هَب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13205'>ءً م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':13206'>نۢب</tajweed>َثًّا
verses.translation: Став рассыпающимся прахом

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':151'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ أَزْو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13207'>جًا ث</tajweed>َلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ثَةً
verses.translation: И вы разделитесь на три потока

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13208'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَيْمَنَةِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13209'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: Собратья правой стороны - Кто ж эти правой стороны собратья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13210'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشْــَٔمَةِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13211'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَشْــَٔمَةِ
verses.translation: Собратья левой стороны - Кто ж эти левой стороны собратья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9999'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِقُونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13212'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>سَّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И те, кто благочестием превосходил других

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أُ<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>وْ</tajweed>لَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ـٰٓ</tajweed>ئِكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13213'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُقَرَّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Будут найболее приближены (к Аллаху)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى جَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':3680'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: В Садах услады

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13214'>ةٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11455'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Много первых (из далеко ушедших лет)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَقَلِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13215'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13216'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И лишь немногие - из поздних лет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَىٰ سُرُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13217'>رٍ م</tajweed>َّوْضُونَةٍ
verses.translation: На ложах, золотом и кАмнями расшитых

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: مُّتَّكِــِٔينَ عَلَيْهَا مُتَقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Облокотясь на них и обратясь лицом друг к другу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: يَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْد<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13218'>نٌ م</tajweed>ُّخَلَّد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Со всех сторон благоприятствовать им будут Прекрасны отроки, навечно (молодые)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بِأَكْوَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13219'>بٍ و</tajweed>َأَبَارِيقَ وَكَأْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13220'>سٍ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':11360'>ِن م</tajweed>َّع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Bi'akwābiw wa abārīq(a), wa ka'sim mim ma'īn(in).
verses.translation: С кувшинами и чашами, С бокалом чистого вина

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يُصَدَّعُونَ عَنْهَا وَلَا يُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13221'>نز</tajweed>ِف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Который (им) ни боли головной, ни (тягот) опьяненья не доставит

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13222'>ةٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَتَخَيَّر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: С плодами, что они (по вкусу) будут выбирать

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَحْمِ طَيْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13223'>رٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َا يَشْتَه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И мясом птиц из тех, что пожелают

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَحُورٌ ع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نٌ
verses.translation: И чернооки, большеглазые девицы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: كَأَمْثَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13224'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>لُّؤْلُوِٕ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13225'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَكْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Подобно тщательно хранимым жемчугам

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: جَز<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='iqlb' data-type='iqlab' data-description='Iqlab' data-tajweed=':3537'>ءَۢ ب</tajweed>ِمَا كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَعْمَل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Как воздаяние за их (земную) добродетель

verses.text_uthmani: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13226'>وًا و</tajweed>َلَا تَأْثِيمًا
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lā yasma'ūna fīhā lagwaw wa lā ta'ṡīmā(n).
verses.translation: Не будет там ни пустословья И никакого побуждения ко злу

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِلَّا قِيل<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13227'>اً س</tajweed>َلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13228'>مًا س</tajweed>َلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا
verses.translation: Звучать лишь будет: "Мир вам! Мир

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13229'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَمِينِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13230'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Собратья правой стороны - Кто ж этой стороны собратья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى سِ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':10979'>دْ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13231'>رٍ م</tajweed>َّخْض<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: (Им пребывать) средь лотоса, лишенного шипов

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَطَلْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13232'>حٍ م</tajweed>َّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':6447'>نض</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: И средь растущих гроздьями плодов банана

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَظِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13233'>لٍّ م</tajweed>َّمْد<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>د</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: Под далеко раскинувшейся тенью

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13234'>ءٍ م</tajweed>َّسْك<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed><tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah'>ب</tajweed>ٍ
verses.translation: На берегу текучих вод

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كِهَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13235'>ةٍ ك</tajweed>َثِيرَةٍ
verses.translation: И средь плодов обильных

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا مَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13236'>قْ</tajweed>طُوعَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13237'>ةٍ و</tajweed>َلَا مَمْنُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: В которых нет (сезонного) предела И нет запрета (потребленью)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَفُرُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13238'>شٍ م</tajweed>َّرْفُوعَةٍ
verses.translation: На возвышающихся ложах

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13239'>نش</tajweed>َأْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13240'>نش</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءً
verses.translation: И создали Мы им (напарниц) Творением особым, (неземным)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13241'>بْ</tajweed>كَارًا
verses.translation: Мы (вечной) девственность их сотворили

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عُرُبًا أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: И сделали их любящими сверстницами (им)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لِّأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13242'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: (Все это) для собратьев правой стороны

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13214'>ةٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11455'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Их много из времен давно ушедших

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَثُلَّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13243'>ةٌ م</tajweed>ِّنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13216'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И много из последующих лет

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13244'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شِّمَالِ م<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13245'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>شِّم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>لِ
verses.translation: Собратья левой стороны - Кто ж этой стороны собратья

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى سَمُو<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13246'>مٍ و</tajweed>َحَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Им пребывать на раскаленном ураганном ветре И в кипящей массе

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَظِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13247'>لٍّ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13248'>ِن ي</tajweed>َحْم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: В тени удушливого дыма

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا بَارِ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13249'>دٍ و</tajweed>َلَا كَر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Неосвежающего и неблагого

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُمْ كَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> قَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':3282'>بْ</tajweed>لَ ذ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>لِكَ مُتْرَف<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ведь жизнь, полную (греховных) удовольствий, Они до этого вели

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يُصِرُّونَ عَلَى <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13250'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13251'>نث</tajweed>ِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13252'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Упорствуя в грехе великом

verses.text_uthmani: وَكَانُوا۟ يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُنَّا تُرَابًا وَعِظَـٰمًا أَءِنَّا لَمَبْعُوثُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَكَانُو<tajweed class='slnt' data-type='silent' data-description='Silent'>اْ</tajweed> يَقُولُونَ أَئِذَا مِتْنَا وَكُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا تُرَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9207'>بًا و</tajweed>َعِظَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>مًا أَءِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':7784'>بْ</tajweed>عُوث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa kānū yaqūlūn(a), a'iżā mitnā  wa kunnā turābaw wa 'iẓāman a'innā lamab'ūṡūn(a).
verses.translation: И так, бывало, говорили: "Ужель, когда умрем и станем прахом и костьми, Мы будем вновь воскрешены

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَوَءَاب<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓؤُنَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11331'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И мы, и наши праотцы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: قُلْ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13253'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَوَّلِينَ وَ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13254'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأَخِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Скажи: "Поистине, (воскреснут все) И новых, и былых времен

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَمَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13255'>جْ</tajweed>مُوعُونَ إِلَىٰ مِيقَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>تِ يَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':9746'>مٍ م</tajweed>َّعْل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: И будут собраны в назначенное время На встречу в День известный

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ثُ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed>َ إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ أَيُّهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13256'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ضّ<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓلُّونَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13257'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И вот тогда вы все, Погрязшие в грехах, отвергшие (Господне откровенье)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَأَكِلُونَ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13258'>ن ش</tajweed>َجَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13259'>رٍ م</tajweed>ِّ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13260'>ن ز</tajweed>َقّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Есть будете плоды заккума

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَمَالِــُٔونَ مِنْهَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':11382'>ٱ</tajweed>لْبُط<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И, наполняя ими животы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَشَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِبُونَ عَلَيْهِ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13261'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Вы запивать их будете кипящею водою

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَشَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>رِبُونَ شُرْبَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13262'>ٱ</tajweed>لْه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Как пьют больные, жаждой истомленные верблюды

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا نُزُلُهُمْ يَوْمَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':9781'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>دّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Таким им будет угощенье в День Расчета

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَحْنُ خَلَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':4250'>قْ</tajweed>نَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>كُمْ فَلَوْلَا تُصَدِّق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Мы сотворили вас, - Так что ж не веруете вы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَرَءَيْت<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9776'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا تُمْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Ужель не зрите вы, как ваше семя Извержено (во чрево ваших жен)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ءَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':716'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَخْلُقُونَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَمْ نَحْنُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13263'>ٱ</tajweed>لْخَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вы или Мы - творцы сего

verses.text_uthmani: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13264'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Naḥnu qaddarnā bainakumul-mauta wa mā naḥnu bimasbūqīn(a).
verses.translation: Назначили Мы смерть для вас уделом равным, И в этом - планов Нашей воли Никто расстроить не способен

verses.text_uthmani: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَـٰلَكُمْ وَنُنشِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: عَلَ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ىٰٓ</tajweed> أ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13265'>َن ن</tajweed>ُّبَدِّلَ أَمْثَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَكُمْ وَنُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13266'>نش</tajweed>ِئَكُمْ فِى مَا لَا تَعْلَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: 'Alā an nubaddila amṡālakum wa nunsyi'akum fī mā lā ta'lamūn(a).
verses.translation: Коль Мы одну из ваших форм Решим сменить другою И снова воссоздать вас в виде, Кой вам доселе был неведом

verses.text_uthmani: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْتُمُ ٱلنَّشْأَةَ ٱلْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَلَقَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':341'>دْ</tajweed> عَلِمْتُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13267'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َشْأَةَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13268'>ٱ</tajweed>لْأُولَىٰ فَلَوْلَا تَذَكَّر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Поистине, известно вам о первой форме сотворенья, - Так что ж об этом вам не поразмыслить

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَرَءَيْت<tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':9776'>ُم م</tajweed>َّا تَحْرُث<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вы видите посев семян (на пашне)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ءَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':716'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ تَزْرَعُونَهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> أَمْ نَحْنُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13269'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>زّ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>رِع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Так в вас иль в Нас Лежит причина их произрастанья

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلْنَـٰهُ حُطَـٰمًا فَظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّهُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَوْ نَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ لَجَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ حُطَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13270'>مًا ف</tajweed>َظَلْتُمْ تَفَكَّه<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lau nasyā'u laja'alnāhu ḥuṭāman fa ẓaltum tafakkahūn(a).
verses.translation: Будь Наша воля, Мы обратили б ваши жатвы В сухой, ненужный порошок, И вы б дивились, (говоря)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َا لَمُغْرَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Мы были все в долги вовлечены

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: بَلْ نَحْنُ مَحْرُوم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: К тому ж теперь мы лишены всего

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13271'>ٱ</tajweed>لْم<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13272'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّذِى تَشْرَب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И та вода, которую вы пьете

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنزَلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنزِلُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ءَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':716'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13273'>نز</tajweed>َلْتُمُوهُ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13274'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُزْنِ أَمْ نَحْنُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13275'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13276'>نز</tajweed>ِل<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вы или Мы из туч ее низводим

verses.text_uthmani: لَوْ نَشَآءُ جَعَلْنَـٰهُ أُجَاجًا فَلَوْلَا تَشْكُرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَوْ نَش<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓءُ جَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هُ أُجَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13277'>جًا ف</tajweed>َلَوْلَا تَشْكُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Lau nasyā'u ja'alnāhu ujājan falau lā tasykurūn(a).
verses.translation: Будь Наша воля, Мы б сделали ее соленой (или горькой). Так отчего ж вы Нам не скажете спасибо

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13278'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َارَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':114'>ٱ</tajweed>لَّتِى تُور<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И тот огонь, который жжете вы

verses.text_uthmani: ءَأَنتُمْ أَنشَأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمْ نَحْنُ ٱلْمُنشِـُٔونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ءَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':716'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13279'>نش</tajweed>َأْتُمْ شَجَرَتَه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أَمْ نَحْنُ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13280'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13281'>نش</tajweed>ِــٔ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вы или Мы взрастили дерево, Которое его питает

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: نَحْنُ جَعَلْنَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>هَا تَذْكِرَ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13282'>ةً و</tajweed>َمَتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13283'>عًا ل</tajweed>ِّلْمُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13284'>قْ</tajweed>و<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Naḥnu ja'alnāhā tażkirataw wa matā'al lil-muqwīn(a).
verses.translation: Мы сделали его Напоминанием (о Нашей Воле), А также для удобства тех, Кто странствует (по свету)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَبِّحْ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13285'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمِ رَبِّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13286'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: А потому восславь ты имя Бога твоего, Всевышнего (Владыки мира)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: ۞ فَل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> أُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13287'>قْ</tajweed>سِمُ بِمَو<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>َٲ</tajweed>قِعِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13288'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed><tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>ُج<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Но нет! Клянусь закатом звезд

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَإِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَقَسَ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13289'>مٌ ل</tajweed>َّوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: Этой поистине великой клятвой! О, если бы вы только разумели

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َهُ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ۥ</tajweed> لَقُرْءَا<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13290'>نٌ ك</tajweed>َر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٌ
verses.translation: Что это - благородный Аль Кор'ан

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فِى كِتَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13291'>بٍ م</tajweed>َّكْن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نٍ
verses.translation: Что тщательно хранится в Книге

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: لَّا يَمَسُّهُ<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>ۥٓ</tajweed> إِلَّا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13292'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُطَهَّر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: К которой прикоснуться могут Лишь те, кто (телом и душою) чист

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':11949'>نز</tajweed>ِي<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':12045'>لٌ م</tajweed>ّ<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':4772'>ِن ر</tajweed>َّبِّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':4'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>لَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Послание от Властелина всех миров

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: أَفَبِهَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13293'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحَدِيثِ أَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':428'>نت</tajweed><tajweed class='idghm_shfw' data-type='idgham-shafawi' data-description='Idgham Shafawi - With Meem' data-tajweed=':13294'>ُم م</tajweed>ُّ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':13295'>دْ</tajweed>هِن<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Неужто это то, Что вас так отвращает

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':11964'>جْ</tajweed>عَلُونَ رِزْقَكُمْ أَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َكُمْ تُكَذِّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И свою долю (в жизни этой) Вы обратите лишь на то, Что отречетесь от него

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَوْل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِذَا بَلَغَتِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13296'>ٱ</tajweed>لْحُلْق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>مَ
verses.translation: Тогда же отчего (бездействуете вы), Когда душа лежащего на смертном одре Уж подступает к самой горловине

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':98'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ حِينَئِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':13297'>ذٍ ت</tajweed>َ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':248'>نظ</tajweed>ُر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вы только (можете) смотреть

verses.text_uthmani: وَنَحْنُ أَقْرَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِنكُمْ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَنَحْنُ أَ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':1355'>قْ</tajweed>رَبُ إِلَيْهِ مِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':344'>نك</tajweed>ُمْ وَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ك<tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':46'>ِن ل</tajweed>َّا تُ<tajweed class='qlq' data-type='qalaqah' data-description='Qalaqah' data-tajweed=':8674'>بْ</tajweed>صِر<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ُو</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa naḥnu aqrabu ilaihi minkum wa lākil lā tubṣirūn(a).
verses.translation: Мы ж для него в сей миг гораздо ближе, Но не увидеть это вам

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَلَوْل<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ غَيْرَ مَدِين<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Falau lā in kuntum gaira madīnīn(a).
verses.translation: Так отчего ж, Коль вы свободны от расчета (с Богом)

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: تَرْجِعُونَه<tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':109'>ن ك</tajweed>ُ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':100'>نت</tajweed>ُمْ صَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>دِق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Вам не вернуть ее назад, Коль правду говорите вы

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2594'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13298'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُقَرَّب<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: И если он - один из тех, кто близок был к Аллаху

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَرَوْ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13299'>حٌ و</tajweed>َرَيْحَا<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13300'>نٌ و</tajweed>َجَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َتُ نَع<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Fa rauḥuw wa raiḥān(un), wa jannatu na'īm(in).
verses.translation: То для него - покой, и все щедроты, И Сад услады, (где ему навечно пребывать)

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنْ أَصْحَـٰبِ ٱلْيَمِينِ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2594'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ مِنْ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13301'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.text_uthmani_transcribed: Wa ammā in kāna min aṣḥābil-yamīn(i).
verses.translation: И если он - один из правой стороны собратьев

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَلَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed><tajweed class='idgh_w_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - Without Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13302'>مٌ ل</tajweed>َّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>بِ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13301'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: То "Мир тебе!" ему приветом будет От правой стороны людей

verses.text_uthmani: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ
verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَأَ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>مّ</tajweed><tajweed class='madda_obligatory' data-type='madda-obligatory' data-description='Obligatory Prolongation: 4-5 Vowels'>َآ</tajweed> إِ<tajweed class='ikhf' data-type='ikhafa' data-description='Ikhafa'' data-tajweed=':2594'>ن ك</tajweed>َانَ مِنَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13303'>ٱ</tajweed>لْمُكَذِّبِينَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13304'>ٱ</tajweed><tajweed class='slnt' data-type='laam-shamsiyah' data-description='Lam Shamsiyyah'>ل</tajweed>ضّ<tajweed class='madda_necessary' data-type='madda-necesssary' data-description='Necessary Prolongation: 6 Vowels'>َا</tajweed>ٓلّ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نَ
verses.translation: Но если он из тех заблудших, Кто ложью (истину) нарек

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَنُزُ<tajweed class='idgh_ghn' data-type='idgham-without-ghunnah' data-description='Idgham - With Ghunnah' data-tajweed=':13305'>لٌ م</tajweed>ِّنْ حَم<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: Ему - кипящая вода как угощенье

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: وَتَصْلِيَةُ جَح<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مٍ
verses.translation: И (вечны) муки в адовом костре

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: إِ<tajweed class='ghn' data-type='ghunnah' data-description='Ghunnah: 2 Vowels'>نّ</tajweed>َ هَ<tajweed class='madda_normal' data-type='madda-normal' data-description='Normal Prolongation: 2 Vowels'>ـٰ</tajweed>ذَا لَهُوَ حَقُّ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13306'>ٱ</tajweed>لْيَق<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>نِ
verses.translation: Поистине, так будет! Сие есть истина и несомненность

verses.text_uthmani_tajweed_parsed: فَسَبِّحْ بِ<tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13285'>ٱ</tajweed>سْمِ رَبِّكَ <tajweed class='ham_wasl' data-type='hamza-wasl' data-description='Hamzat ul Wasl' data-tajweed=':13286'>ٱ</tajweed>لْعَظ<tajweed class='madda_permissible' data-type='madda-permissible' data-description='Permissible Prolongation: 2, 4, 6 Vowels'>ِي</tajweed>مِ
verses.translation: Так славь же имя Бога твоего, Всевышнего (Властителя миров)
